DOC.brief_summary: Study order quantify toxin removal dialysis
DOC.criteria: Substudy 1 : include new start dialysis patient peritoneal dialysis PD haemodialysis HD Substudy 2 : stabile haemodialysis patient peritoneal dialysis patient . Patients match gender , time dialysis , diabetes , renal function start dialysis . Substudy 3 : patient CAPD ( continuous ambulant PD ) CCPD ( continuous cyclic PD ) .
